metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3790 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php in Adiscon LogAnalyzer before 3.4.4 and 3.5.x before 3.5.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the highlight parameter in a Search action.

criterions.comment: loganalyzer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
